text: <@U0KM61BCP> <@U11HH3P7Y> I am ok with <#C11SL9YDV|fabric-ci-status> but developers rarely look there unless there’s a ci problem; not sure about none-fabric developers, but i guess they would come here more often
<@U0KN2SSKE> exactly - my concern is that the bot messages be perceived as spam and people will be annoyed at their conversations being hijacked with interspersed bot spam
IMO, they only need to go to ci-status if there's a problem
if we can post ONLY failed builds here, and then just a reference to the build's output (not a large post) that might be okay
